summary: PHP SDK worker initialization fails with unmarshaling error when using RoadRunner with Symfony Serializer data converter. The issue occurs in GetWorkerInfo.php due to missing preserve_empty_objects option in the serializer configuration.
userImpact: Users cannot start PHP workers with RoadRunner and Symfony Serializer when using the default configuration.
rootCause: SymfonySerializerDataConverter missing 'preserve_empty_objects' => true option during serialization, causing array/object type mismatch when unmarshaling WorkerInfo.Flags
proposedFix: Add 'preserve_empty_objects' => true option to the SymfonySerializerDataConverter configuration in the temporal-bundle
workaround: Explicitly configure SymfonySerializerDataConverter with the preserve_empty_objects option set to true
resolutionDetails: Issue was identified as configuration problem in the bundle rather than SDK bug; user resolved by applying proper serializer options
keyQuote: it's issue in bundle which you are using - should have option ['preserve_empty_objects' => true]
